entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 09:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -35.0°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
